write in.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to write a letter to an organization to give an opinion, ask for information etc
write in.translation[0].definitions[0].e: If you would like a copy of our fact sheet, please write in, enclosing a stamped addressed envelope.

write in.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to write a piece of information in the space provided for it on a form or document
write in.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Provide some space for students to write in their hobbies.
